buyitem.title: You bought {ITEM}
description: A {ITEM} was bought via the [CountBot Shop](https://bremea.com/countbot/shop)
Didn't get that item? [Let us know.](https://discord.gg/meWdwaJ)
Yikes! It looks like you don't have proper permissions to run this command. **Only bremea development staff can use this command.**
Yikes! It looks like you don't have proper permissions to run this command. **Make sure you have "Manage Channel" perms.**
Yikes! It doesn't look like this is a counting channel. **Make sure you are running this command in a counting channel run by CountBot.**

notacommand.description: Hmm... it seems that command doesn't exist. Check the spelling and try again.

help.countonly: :warning: **This command can only be used in counting channels.**
help.admin: :warning: **This command can only be members who have `Manage Channel` permissions.**

setup.name: Setup Commands
setup.value:
`c;new <number>` Creates a new channel where the goal is to count to a number.
`c;merge` Sets up the bot in an extisting counting channel.
